name: Kin Man
description:
Anything can hurt you, but should you hurt it?

Controls:
Keyboard mouse
[WASD] - Movement

[Shift] - Jump
[Shift] - Sprint

[E] to pick up abilities
[Right Click] - Prepare and Charge Spell
[Right Click + Left Click] - Cast Spell

The world is held in a balance between Love and War, this may not be easy to notice in the submitted build, but you can manually change the balance by pressing [0] & [9]

No Multiplayer

Developed by BANCZ in 5 days for the UE4 Winter Jame 2019!

Alex P, Anna E, Ben B, Nick H, Zay P
